channel.title: Themes on Fathy AR
channel.description: Recent content in Themes on Fathy AR

item.title: Introducing My Hugo Theme, Elementary
item.description: Elementary is a Hugo theme I created for my blog, this very blog. It is built based on another Hugo theme called smol. The design of some parts of it is inspired by a fork of smol. Note that Elementary is still a work in progress. You can visit its project repository on GitHub.
